name: MEC Cabin Lounge
categories: Gear lofts, vestibules and tent add-ons
description: Lay back, throw your feet up and relax, this oversized vestibule is weather- and bug-proof. The Cabin Lounge zip-on room adds nearly 7sq.m. of living space to your MEC Cabin 2.0 tent. Use it as a cooking or storage area, hang-out shelter, or an additional sleeping room.Made of 75-denier polyester with a waterproof polyurethane coating - the same as the Cabin 2.0 tent fly.No-see-um mesh windows provide bug protection and wilderness views, and can be covered when the weather turns.Zips quickly and easily to the front fly, with one side acting as the attachment and the door.Peak height of 1.8m provides plenty of headroom.Includes 6 steel pegs and 2 guylines.Compatible with the MEC Cabin 2.0 series tents.
